Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the immigration officer erred in refusing the application based on a non-bona fide marriage
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Both parties admitted to non-consummation and convenience nature of marriage
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage deemed not genuine or bona fide
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Reasonableness of the immigration officer's decision
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Admission of non-consummation and convenience marriage
Crimes.Application_Error: None found – officer acted within jurisdiction
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to administrative decisions
Crimes.Application_Factor: Special authorization does not guarantee permanent residency
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board / Immigration Officer
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Alleged legal or procedural error in refusal
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Immigration Act s. 19(1)(d) and Regulations s. 4(3)
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Parties interviewed separately; opportunity to respond provided
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant and spouse lacked credibility due to admissions
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to legality and procedural fairness of refusal
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA) framework
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Allegation of procedural unfairness, rejected by court
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Marriage entered into solely for immigration benefit

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Permanent Residence Application Based on Suspected Fraudulent Marriage
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the immigration officer erred in refusing the application due to fraudulent marriage
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration Act and Regulations – family class sponsorship requirements
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Both parties admitted marriage was not consummated and was for immigration purposes
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage lacked bona fides; intended as a convenience
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of marital legitimacy, including non-consummation and admissions
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Immigration Regulations related to family class sponsorship
Crimes.Application_Error: No legal or procedural error found
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Bona fide requirement for spousal sponsorship
Crimes.Application_Factor: Special authorization does not equate to approval of permanent residency
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Legality and procedural fairness of refusal based on marriage fraud
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA provisions on family class sponsorship and admissibility
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Marriage reported and proven to be one of convenience
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Fair process followed: interviews, evidence review, right to respond
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Low credibility due to inconsistent behavior and admissions
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that decision was unreasonable or procedurally unfair
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Alleged lack of fairness, rejected by court
